author: rbb
msg: Take a couple of values that were static for all locks out of the lock
structure.  These values are now created once and used for all locks.

author: stoddard
msg: More sendfile tweaks for Windows. Still not ready for prime time.

author: rbb
msg: Namespace protect the HAVE_SEMUN variable that was added.  This has not
been tested fully, because I don't have access to a platform that uses
semaphores, but the logic is sound.

author: stoddard
msg: Update Windows network_io functions. sendfile needs more work to pick up headers,
